Symbol.Script_2D:
! ============================================================================== ! General Settings ! ============================================================================== if not(txt_2D) then end unID = 1000 pen font_pen
! ============================================================================== ! Text Extension ! ============================================================================== num = 0 if (txt_1 <> "") then num = num + 1 firstChar = strsub(txt_1,1,1) lastchar = strsub(txt_1,strlen(txt_1)-1,1) if firstChar <> " " then txt_1 = " " + txt_1 if lastchar <> " " then txt_1 = txt_1 + " " endif if (txt_2 <> "") then num = num + 1 firstChar = strsub(txt_2,1,1) lastchar = strsub(txt_2,strlen(txt_2)-1,1) if firstChar <> " " then txt_2 = " " + txt_2 if lastchar <> " " then txt_2 = txt_2 + " " endif if (txt_3 <> "") then num = num + 1 firstChar = strsub(txt_3,1,1) lastchar = strsub(txt_3,strlen(txt_3)-1,1) if firstChar <> " " then txt_3 = " " + txt_3 if lastchar <> " " then txt_3 = txt_3 + " " endif if (txt_4 <> "") then num = num + 1 firstChar = strsub(txt_4,1,1) lastchar = strsub(txt_4,strlen(txt_4)-1,1) if firstChar <> " " then txt_4 = " " + txt_4 if lastchar <> " " then txt_4 = txt_4 + " " endif if (txt_5 <> "") then num = num + 1 firstChar = strsub(txt_5,1,1) lastchar = strsub(txt_5,strlen(txt_5)-1,1) if firstChar <> " " then txt_5 = " " + txt_5 if lastchar <> " " then txt_5 = txt_5 + " " endif
! ============================================================================== ! Style ! ==============================================================================
define style "styleID" font_type, font_size, 1+2*SYMB_MIRRORED, gs_text_style_bold + 2*gs_text_style_italic + 4*gs_text_style_underline set style "styleID"
textH = 0 qq = request("Height_of_style", "styleID", _h, _descent, _leading) if qq then textH = _h * paperToModel
szel_1 = stw (txt_1) * paperToModel szel_2 = stw (txt_2) * paperToModel szel_3 = stw (txt_3) * paperToModel szel_4 = stw (txt_4) * paperToModel szel_5 = stw (txt_5) * paperToModel szel = max(szel_1, szel_2, szel_3, szel_4, szel_5)
! ============================================================================== ! Oriented View ! ============================================================================== angleViewRot = 0 readAngle = 90 iMirrored = 1-(2*SYMB_MIRRORED) qqq = request ("View_Rotangle", "", angleViewRot) totalRotate = (SYMB_ROTANGLE + angleViewRot + angle) MOD 360 bTextRotate = (totalRotate > (readAngle + eps*iMirrored) & totalRotate < (readAngle + 180 + eps*iMirrored)) textRotate = 180 * bTextRotate
! ============================================================================== ! Hotspots ! ============================================================================== hotspot2 hota, 0, unID, hotb, 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 hota, -1, unID, hotb, 3 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 hota, hotb, unID, hotb, 2 : unID = unID + 1
hotspot2 0, hotb, unID, hota, 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 -1, hotb, unID, hota, 3 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 hota, hotb, unID, hota, 2 : unID = unID + 1
add2 hota,hotb rot2 textRotate
hotspot2 0, 0, unID, angle, 6 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 szel/2, 0, unID, angle, 4+128 : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 szel/2*cos(angle), szel/2*sin(angle), unID, angle, 5 : unID = unID + 1
rot2 angle
! ============================================================================== ! Text ! ============================================================================== add2 -szel/2, 0
if num > 0 then add2 SYMB_MIRRORED*szel, 0 y = textH*num*bTextRotate
if (txt_1 <> "") then text2 0, y, txt_1 y = y - textH endif if (txt_2 <> "") then text2 0, y, txt_2 y = y - textH endif if (txt_3 <> "") then text2 0, y, txt_3 y = y - textH endif if (txt_4 <> "") then text2 0, y, txt_4 y = y - textH endif if (txt_5 <> "") then text2 0, y, txt_5 endif del 1
if abs(szel) > EPS & abs(-textH*num*(1-2*(bTextRotate))) > EPS then rect2 0,0,szel,-textH*num*(1-2*(bTextRotate)) endif endif
del 4
Symbol.Script_1D:
eps = 0.0001 paperToModel = GLOB_SCALE / 1000 modelToPaper = 1000 / GLOB_SCALE
! ============================================================================== ! Old parameters conversion ! ============================================================================== dim font_style_mtr[4] font_style_mtr[1]=`Regular` font_style_mtr[2]=`Bold` font_style_mtr[3]=`Italic` font_style_mtr[4]=`Converted`
if font_style <> font_style_mtr[4] then font_size = font_size*100/GLOB_SCALE
gs_text_style_bold = 0 gs_text_style_italic = 0 gs_text_style_underline = 0
if font_style = font_style_mtr[2] then gs_text_style_bold = 1 if font_style = font_style_mtr[3] then gs_text_style_italic = 1
parameters font_size = font_size, font_style = font_style_mtr[4], gs_text_style_bold = gs_text_style_bold, gs_text_style_italic = gs_text_style_italic, gs_text_style_underline = gs_text_style_underline
!TODO eseteleg pozicio migráció endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 5 | GLOB_CONTEXT = 1 then
! ============================================================================== ! Text Style ! ============================================================================== dim fontNames[] n = request("FONTNAMES_LIST", "", fontNames) values "font_type" fontNames, custom
if font_size < 0.1 then font_size = 1.0 parameters font_size = font_size endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iFontPen" then iFontPen = min(max(iFontPen, 1), 255) font_pen = iFontPen parameters iFontPen = iFontPen, font_pen = font_pen else font_pen = max(font_pen, 1) iFontPen = font_pen parameters iFontPen = iFontPen, font_pen = font_pen endif
! ============================================================================== ! Hide parameters ! ============================================================================== if not(txt_2D) then hideparameter "font_type", "font_style", "font_pen", "iFontPen", "font_size", "gs_text_style_bold", "gs_text_style_italic", "gs_text_style_underline", "hota", "hotb", "angle" !"txt_1", !"txt_2", !"txt_3", !"txt_4", !"txt_5"
lock "font_type", "font_style", "font_pen", "iFontPen", "font_size", "gs_text_style_bold", "gs_text_style_italic", "gs_text_style_underline", "hota", "hotb", "angle" !"txt_1", !"txt_2", !"txt_3", !"txt_4", !"txt_5" endif
endif
